721341f.text:
Madison Avenue at S.W. corner of 47th Street, showing the RitrCarlton Hotel. The stores along the Madison Avenue front were added to the building as alterations in 1921, when the Avenue
was widened.
1921-1922.

47th Street, north side, west from and including Madison Avenue. The tall building in the centre is 580 Fifth avenue at the N.W.

1558238.title: East 47th Street - Madison Avenue
1558238.folder: East 47th Street - Madison Avenue, Manhattan, NY

721343f-a.text:
Madison Avenue, west side north from 47th Street. Shows buildings between 49th and 50th Streets which were wrecked that summer, and just beyond them may be seen the roof of the Lady Chapel
of St. Patrick's Cathedral.
April 27, 1930.
P.L. Sperr, Photographer.
